title: On the Launchpad
text: You arrive at the launchpad and you see your the crew boarding the space shuttle. You see your three favorite astronauts boarding the shuttle: the cranky old Buzz Legstrong, the scrappy genius Callie Ride, and the fearless leader Neil Aldrin. You also see Scampy Shrimpington, the world's smallest astronaut, limping along behind the rest of the crew; Shrimpington looks deathly ill, but is struggling along towards the shuttle to board for launch. You only have a chance to wave and say hi to one of your favorite astronauts. Which astronaut do you greet?
